data.name: AzureSignToolSignatureProviderSigning
data.comment: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: CertificateIsNotYetTimeValid
data.value: The certificate is not yet time valid.
data.comment: A certificate has a validity period with start and end dates. "not yet time valid" means that the start date is in the future.

data.name: ClickOnceSignatureProviderSigning
data.comment: {Locked="Mage"} is another signing tool. {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: CliStandardError
data.comment: {fileName} is a file name and {error} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: CliStandardOutput
data.comment: {fileName} is a file name and {output} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: CreatingDirectory
data.comment: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: DeletedDirectory
data.comment: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: DeletingDirectory
data.comment: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: DirectoryNotDeleted
data.comment: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: EditingAppInstaller
data.comment: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: ErrorSigningVsix
data.value: An unspecified error occurred during VSIX signing.

data.name: ExceptionWhileDeletingDirectory
data.value: An exception occurred while attempting to delete directory {path}.
data.comment: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: FetchedCertificate
data.comment: {milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: FetchingCertificate
data.value: Fetching certificate from Azure Key Vault.

data.name: OpeningContainer
data.comment: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: ProcessCouldNotBeKilled
data.value: {0} timed out and could not be killed.
data.comment: {0} is a file path.

data.name: ProcessDidNotExitInTime
data.value: {fileName} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {exitCode}.
data.comment: {fileName} is a file name and {exitCode} is a number representing the error code returned from a process. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: ProcessDidNotExitInTimeWithArguments
data.value: {0} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {1}. Arguments: {2}
data.comment: {0} is a file name. {1} is a process exit code. {2} is process arguments.

data.name: RunningCli
data.comment: {fileName} is a file name and {args} is process arguments. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SavingContainer
data.comment: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SignAsyncCalled
data.comment: {filePath} and {localFilePath} are both file paths. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SigningAttempt
data.value: Performing attempt #{attempt} of {maxAttempts} attempts after {seconds} s.
data.comment: {attempt} and {maxAttempts} are numbers representing the current attempt (as a number) and the maximum allowed attempts (as a number). "s" is the unit abbreviation for seconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SigningFailed
data.comment: {0} is a file path.

data.name: SigningFailedWithError
data.comment: {errorCode} is an error code. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SigningFile
data.comment: {filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SigningSucceededWithTimeElapsed
data.comment: {filePath} is a file path, {milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: SubmittingFileForSigning
data.comment: {filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

data.name: ValueCannotBeEmptyString
data.value: The value cannot be an empty string.

data.name: VsixSignatureProviderSigning
data.comment: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
